com.alexkasko.unsafe.bytearray
Class BitShiftLittleEndianByteArrayTool

java.lang.Object
  com.alexkasko.unsafe.bytearray.ByteArrayTool
      com.alexkasko.unsafe.bytearray.BitShiftLittleEndianByteArrayTool

 class BitShiftLittleEndianByteArrayTool
extends ByteArrayTool

Implementation of ByteArrayTool using bits shifting and standard byte array operations.

Author:
alexkasko Date: 12/11/12

copy

public void copy(byte[] input,
                 int inputIndex,
                 byte[] output,
                 int outputIndex,
                 int length)
Copies part of one array into another. Unsafe implementation has less bounds checks (if assertions are disabled in runtime) then System.arraycopy(Object, int, Object, int, int) that is used by fallback implementation uses

Specified by:
copy in class ByteArrayTool
Parameters:
input - source array
inputIndex - source array position
output - destination array
outputIndex - destination array position
length - length to copy
